description.value:
You can remove conditions with divine grace.

You can sacrifice one @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Heal]{Heal} spell you've prepared in your extra slots from healing font to cast one of the following spells instead: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Remove Curse]{Remove Curse}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Remove Disease]{Remove Disease}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Remove Paralysis]{Remove Paralysis}, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Restoration]{Restoration}. The spell is heightened to the same level as the heal spell you sacrificed.
